text: atakhadh almunafiqun 'aymanihim alkadhibat waqayat lahum min alqatl bsbb kafrihim, walimane almuslimin ean qitalihim wa'akhadh 'amwalihim, fabasabib dhlk sddu 'anfusahum waghayrahum ean sabil allah wahu al'iislamu, falahum eadhab mudhll fi alnaara; liastikbarihim ean al'iiman biallah warasulih wsddihm ean sabiliha
